title: Task Claim Request
description: Request to claim (or reclaim) a task

runId.description: **optional**, provided when reclaiming a task, for which the worker is already executing a run, but the worker wants to extend `takenUntil`. Do not provide this property, if you're claiming a new task.

workerGroup.description: Identifier for group that worker claiming the task is a part of.

workerId.description: Identifier for worker within the given workerGroup
